name: content-service
description: A content service for storing and retreiving content

scripts.docker-run: sh -c "docker run -it --rm --name content-service-running -p 80:8080 -e RACKSPACE_USERNAME=$RACKSPACE_USERNAME -e RACKSPACE_APIKEY=$RACKSPACE_APIKEY -e RACKSPACE_REGION=$RACKSPACE_REGION -e RACKSPACE_CONTAINER=$RACKSPACE_CONTAINER -e CONTENT_LOG_LEVEL=$CONTENT_LOG_LEVEL content-service"

author: Ken Perkins <ken.perkins@rackspace.com>
